textContent: localStorage works similarly to sessionStorage, but the difference is that data stored in localStorage is persistent and lasts forever for that specific domain unless the browser’s cache is cleared or we clear localStorage using JavaScript because localStorage data can only be manipulated by JavaScript.
title: localStorage
textContentHtml: localStorage works similarly to sessionStorage, but the difference is that data stored in localStorage is persistent and lasts forever for that specific domain unless the browser’s cache is cleared or we clear localStorage using JavaScript because localStorage data can only be manipulated by JavaScript.
